title: Understand the Binomial Expansion
text: The binomial expansion allows us to expand expressions in the form of $${\left(a+b\right)}^n$$. Each term in the expansion will have coefficients determined by the binomial theorem.

title: Identify $$n$$ and the Terms
text: In the expression $${\left(4x+2y\right)}^5$$, identify the values of a and $$b$$, and $$n$$ for the binomial theorem application.

title: Calculate Coefficient using Binomial Theorem
text: Use the binomial coefficient formula $$C(n,k)=\frac{n!}{k!(n-k)!}$$ to find the coefficient for each term. What is the coefficient for the term associated with $$x^4 y$$?

title: Determine the Powers of $$x$$ and $$y$$
text: For each term, determine the power of $$x$$ and $$y$$ by $$x^{(5-k)} y^k$$ where k is the term index. What is the power of $$x$$ for the term with $$x^4 y$$?

title: Expand the Expression Term-by-Term
text: Use the coefficients and powers calculated to write each term of the expansion. Write down the first term including its coefficient and the powers of $$x$$ and $$y$$.
